metadata.Title: CVE-2020-1696 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in the all pki-core 10.x.x versions, where TokenProcessing Service (TPS) where it did not properly sanitize Profile IDs,enabling a Stored Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability when the profileID is printed. An attacker with sufficient permissions could trick anauthenticated victim into executing a specially crafted Javascript code.

criterions.comment: dogtag-pki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
